entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 26 Dec 2023 20:01:38
entry.summary: In recent news, Elon Musk's company, X, is facing a legal battle as it has failed to pay its staff millions of dollars in annual bonuses. This development has raised concerns about the treatment of employees and the financial practices within the company. Meanwhile, the CEO of Avocados from Mexico has set a goal to entice Generation Z to consume more avocados by the year 2024. This initiative aims to tap into the preferences and habits of the younger generation, who are known for their interest in healthy and sustainable food choices. However, despite their apparent dislike for corporate jobs, Gen Zers' dissatisfaction may not be as straightforward as it seems. The complexities of their discontent may stem from various factors, such as work-life balance, lack of purpose, or the influence of "hustle culture" prevalent in the tech industry. This reflection sheds light on the toll that this culture takes on individuals and the need for a more balanced approach to work.
